criterion: Provides overly complicated medical jargon without explaining it
Does not mention the importance of establishing a patient-provider relationship in telehealth
Incorrectly states that telehealth platforms can diagnose and treat mental health conditions
Asks the user for their specific needs and concerns before providing guidelines

Asks the user if they have any specific questions or concerns before providing guidelines
